CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS('AU', TEXT( Country__c )) ,'Oceania', IF(CONTAINS('BE:CH:DE:ES:FR:IE:IT:NL:NO:TR',TEXT( Country__c )), 'Europe', IF(CONTAINS('BR:CL:MX:PE',TEXT( Country__c ) ), 'LATAM', IF(CONTAINS('CA:US',TEXT( Country__c ) ), 'North America', IF(CONTAINS('CN',TEXT( Country__c ) ),'China', IF(CONTAINS('IN',TEXT( Country__c ) ), 'India', IF(CONTAINS('PH',TEXT( Country__c ) ), 'ASEAN', IF(CONTAINS('PK',TEXT( Country__c ) ), 'Africa & MENA', null) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Region
